fields.label: Contact Section Title
fields.name: contact_section_title
fields.instructions: Enter a title for the contact section at the bottom of the site. This will house your physical address, phone number, etc. The title should have something to do with contacting the subject of the website. Text is limited to 20 characters including spaces.

fields.label: Address Line 1
fields.name: address_line_1
fields.instructions: Enter the first line of your address.

fields.label: Address Line 2
fields.name: address_line_2
fields.instructions: Enter the second line of your address.

fields.label: Phone Number
fields.name: phone_number
fields.instructions: Enter the phone number you would like to display.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.name: email_address
fields.instructions: Enter the email address you would like to display.

fields.label: Footer Social Media Links
fields.name: social_nav
fields.instructions: Choose which buttons you would like to display for social media in the footer's contact section. For each button, choose an icon and enter a URL the icon should link to. For example, choose a Yelp icon and paste in the link to your business's Yelp page.

sub_fields.label: Social Icon
sub_fields.name: social_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which icon should be displayed

sub_fields.label: Social URL
sub_fields.name: social_url
sub_fields.instructions: Paste a URL for this icon to link to.

fields.label: Site Logo
fields.name: site_logo
fields.instructions: Choose an image for the site's logo. This will be displayed in the navigation bar at the top left. Recommended images are square and 500px wide or smaller.

fields.label: Contact Form Title
fields.name: contact_form_title
fields.instructions: Enter text to display overtop of your contact form. This should suggest that the user sends you an email or signs up for your email list, whichever is relevant. Text is limited to 32 characters including spaces.

fields.label: Fonts
fields.name: font_pairing
fields.instructions: Select the primary and secondary fonts for your site. The primary font will be used on elements such as navigation items, headings, buttons, and forms. The secondary font will be used in descriptions and body copy.

choices.4: Noto Serif Black and Noto Serif Light

fields.label: Primary Color
fields.name: primary_color
fields.instructions: Enter the site's primary color. This color will be used for major components such as the navigation, footer, and welcome gate panel, as well as Heading 1 and Heading 4 text. Once this is entered correctly, it is recommended to make no changes.

fields.label: Secondary Color
fields.name: secondary_color
fields.instructions: Enter the site's secondary color. This color will be used for secondary components such as icon panel backgrounds, icon panel background image filters, and Heading 2 text. Once this is entered correctly, it is recommended to make no changes.

fields.label: Tertiary Color
fields.name: tertiary_color
fields.instructions: Enter the site's tertiary color. This color will be used for links and buttons in the intro or text panels, as well as Heading 3 and Heading 5 text. Once this is entered correctly, it is recommended to make no changes.

fields.label: Google Analytics Code
fields.name: google_analytics_code
fields.instructions: Paste in the code provided by Google Analytics if you want to use this service. If left blank, Google Analytics will not be used on the site. If this field is filled correctly, it is recommended to not edit it unless you want to switch the site to a different Google Analytics account.

fields.label: Breadcrums On or Off: Blog
fields.name: breadcrumb_switch_blog
fields.instructions: Use this switch to turn off breadcrumbs for the blog archive and blog category archive pages.

fields.label: Blog Title
fields.name: blog_title
fields.instructions: Enter the title of your blog page here. The same as other welcome gate titles, this is limited to 46 characters max including spaces.

fields.label: Blog Welcome Gate Background Image
fields.name: blog_welcome_bg
fields.instructions: Enter the image to use as your blog's welcome gate background image.

fields.label: Contact Form Shortcode
fields.name: contact_form_shortcode
fields.instructions: Paste in the shortcode for the footer's contact form. This will be generated by Mailchimp for WP, or Contact Form 7, depending on the site's spec. Once this is entered, it is recommended to make no changes to it.

fields.label: Google Sitemap Verification
fields.name: google_sitemap_verification
fields.instructions: Paste in code for Google Sitemap Verification. If you do not wish to use this service or if you wish to verify in a different way, this field can be left blank. If this field is filled correctly, it is recommended to not edit it.

fields.label: Bing Sitemap Verification
fields.name: bing_sitemap_verification
fields.instructions: Paste in code provided by Bing for Bing Sitemap Verification. If you wish to not use this service or if you wish to verify with a different method, this field may be left blank. If this field is filled correctly, it is recommended to not edit it.

fields.label: Custom Footer Color On or Off
fields.name: custom_color_on_or_off
fields.instructions: Turn this on to add a custom color to the footer, independent of the site's main color scheme.

fields.label: Custom Footer Color
fields.name: custom_footer_color
fields.instructions: After turning on footer custom color, enter the custom color here.

fields.label: Custom Nav Color On or Off
fields.name: custom_nav_color_on_or_off
fields.instructions: To use a custom color for your site navigation, independent of the site's main color scheme, turn this on then enter your custom color.

fields.label: Custom Nav Color
fields.name: custom_nav_color
fields.instructions: After turning on custom nav color, enter your custom color here.

fields.label: Centered Welcome Gate Text
fields.name: wg_center
fields.instructions: Would you like the text in your welcome gates to be centered instead of left aligned? Turn this option on.

fields.label: Statement
fields.name: statement
fields.instructions: Enter text to be used as the main callout in the welcome section (first panel) of the site. This should say something important about the subject of the website. This is limited to 46 characters max including spaces.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Choose an image to be used as the background of the Hero Panel: the first panel of the page. This image should be 2000px wide or wider and 1300px tall or taller, with no sharp pattern or eye-catching point of interest that distracts from the page's title, which will be over top of the image.

fields.label: Background Image Filter
fields.name: bg_img_filter
fields.instructions: If you entered a background image for the hero panel, choose whether it should have a transparent filter over it that matches the primary color of your color scheme. This will make the hero panel text more legible and will keep site design consistent. Default is ON. Only turn this off if it obscures important aspects of the background photo or if you plan to not use text.

fields.label: Welcome Gate Custom Color On or Off
fields.name: welcome_gate_custom_color_on_or_off
fields.instructions: To use a custom color for the welcome gate, first turn this on.

fields.label: Welcome Gate Custom Color
fields.name: welcome_gate_custom_color
fields.instructions: After turning on custom color, enter your custom welcome gate color here.

fields.label: Breadcrums On or Off
fields.name: breadcrumb_switch
fields.instructions: Use this switch to turn off breadcrumbs for this page.

fields.label: Item Layout
fields.name: item_layout
fields.instructions: Select list layout or grid layout.

sub_fields.label: Panel ID
sub_fields.name: panel_id
sub_fields.instructions: Create an ID for this panel from alphanumeric characters and no capitals (a-z0-9). This will allow you to add an item to the navigation to scroll to this panel. To create the navigation link, go to Appearance > Menus, select "main_nav," add a Custom Link, and paste this panel's ID into the "href" field, adding a pound sign at the beginning. Name the navigation item whatever you would like. Example of a valid panel ID: panel1. Example of link to panel1: #panel1.

sub_fields.label: Main Blurb
sub_fields.name: main_blurb
sub_fields.instructions: Enter text to be displayed as the large main callout for this panel. Text is limited to 50 characters including spaces.

sub_fields.label: Intro text
sub_fields.name: intro_text
sub_fields.instructions: Enter text to be used as the description in the welcome section (first panel) of the site. This can elaborate on the main blurb, or provide more important information about the subject of the website. Text is recommended to be 900 characters, or two full paragraphs, or less.

sub_fields.label: CTA Title
sub_fields.name: cta_title
sub_fields.instructions: If you would like this panel to have a button below the panel title, enter the text this button should display. Text is limited to 14 characters including spaces.

sub_fields.label: CTA Link
sub_fields.name: cta_link
sub_fields.instructions: If you would like this panel to have a button below the panel title, enter a URL this button should link to.

sub_fields.label: Panel Background Image
sub_fields.name: panel_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a background image for this card. If none is selected, the background will be the theme's Secondary Color. It is recommended that this image be 2000px wide or wider and 1300px tall or taller.

sub_fields.label: Cards Panel
sub_fields.name: cards
sub_fields.instructions: Click 'Add Card' to create a new card. Each card has an image, title, blurb, and optional URL the card can link to.

sub_fields.label: Card Image
sub_fields.name: card_image
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the image for this card. Recommended images are icons and images with content that will be visible at relatively small sizes. Images should be 800px wide or smaller.

sub_fields.label: Card Title
sub_fields.name: card_title
sub_fields.instructions: Create a title for this card. Text is limited to 25 characters including spaces.

sub_fields.label: Card Blurb
sub_fields.name: card_blurb
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a blurb, or description text, for this card. This text should be relevant to the card's other content, including its image and title. Text is recommended to be 265 characters maximum including spaces.

sub_fields.label: Card Link (Optional)
sub_fields.name: card_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a URL for the card to link to

sub_fields.label: Text Panel
sub_fields.name: text_panel
sub_fields.instructions: This panel allows for custom text and content. Click 'Add Column' to create a column for your content. For two columns, add another. Columns are limited to 2. When you have two columns, the top text box will be the left column, and the bottom text box will be the right column. Total content for both columns combined should be less than 8 paragraphs and 2 small images.

fields.label: Breadcrums On or Off
fields.name: breadcrumb_switch
fields.instructions: Use this switch to turn off breadcrumbs for this page.

fields.label: Content Columns
fields.name: content_columns
fields.instructions: This panel allows for custom text and content. Click 'Add Column' to create a column for your content. For two columns, add another. Columns are limited to 2. When you have two columns, the top text box will be the left column, and the bottom text box will be the right column.

fields.label: Statement
fields.name: statement
fields.instructions: Enter text to be used as the main callout in the welcome section (first panel) of the site. This should say something important about the subject of the website. This is limited to 46 characters max including spaces.

fields.label: Main Blurb
fields.name: main_blurb
fields.instructions: Enter text to be used as the description in the welcome section (first panel) of the site. This can elaborate on the main blurb, or provide more important information about the subject of the website. Text is limited to 600 characters or less including spaces.

fields.label: Logo Graphic
fields.name: logo_graphic
fields.instructions: To use a logo graphic in the welcome gate instead of text, enter an image from your media library here. To switch back to text, clear the image entered here. It is recommended to not use an image wider than 1200px or taller than 500px.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Choose an image to be used as the background of the Welcome Gate: the first panel of the website. This image should be 2000px wide or wider and 1300px tall or taller, with no sharp pattern or eye-catching point of interest that distracts from the site's title, which will be over top of the image.

fields.label: Backgorund Image Filter
fields.name: bg_img_filter
fields.instructions: If you entered a background image for the welcome gate, choose whether it should have a transparent filter over it that matches the primary color of your color scheme. This will make the welcome gate text more legible and will keep site design consistent. Default is ON. Only turn this off if it obscures important aspects of the background photo or if you plan to not use text.

fields.label: Welcome Gate Custom Color On or Off
fields.name: welcome_gate_custom_color_on_or_off
fields.instructions: To use a custom color for the welcome gate, first turn this on.

fields.label: Welcome Gate Custom Color
fields.name: welcome_gate_custom_color
fields.instructions: After turning on custom color, enter your custom welcome gate color here.
